item.description:
Something a little different for the next meeting.
Charles will bring a segment of the RAI TV film: "La Mattenza: Dei silenzi sulla mafia al silenzio della mafia" for us to watch. The screenplay was written by Carlo Lucarelli, a noteworthy Italian mystery writer.
Also, the second orientation meeting for John Jordan's Italian lessons will be meeting at the same time, but downstairs. The regular group will meet upstairs, as usual, and we will try to watch Charles' film downstairs after John finishes his orientation.

a prosimma, Warren Agin

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano
